properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 290259Z JUL
   BY M/V WESTERN NEPTUNE TOWING 12 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES AND M/V GECO DIAMOND TOWING
   250 METER LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-45.43S 041-07.03W, 22-35.89S 040-39.53W,
   22-43.22S 040-36.21W, 22-53.15S 041-04.58W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1404/10.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 290359Z JUL.
